SettingsItem.Name: Risk calculation tier
SettingsItem.Description: Specifies the module settings should be set according to a pre-defined tier or using custom settings.

SettingsItem.Name: Health effect type
SettingsItem.Description: Specifies whether the health effect is a risk (negative) or benefit (positive).

SettingsItem.Name: Risk characterization ratio
SettingsItem.Description: Report risks in terms of exposure/threshold value (HI, HQ, RPI) or threshold value/exposure (MOE(T)).

SettingsItem.Name: Compute cumulative risks
SettingsItem.Description: Specifies whether to compute the combined/cumulative risk over all substances.

SettingsItem.Name: Left margin safety plot
SettingsItem.Description: Left margin of the plot for threshold value/exposure or exposure/threshold value.

SettingsItem.Name: Right margin safety plot
SettingsItem.Description: Right margin of the plot for threshold value/exposure of exposure/threshold value.

SettingsItem.Name: Number of plot labels
SettingsItem.Description: Maximum number of labels to plot in hazard vs exposure plot.

SettingsItem.Name: Show equivalent animal dose output
SettingsItem.Description: Specifies whether equivalent animal doses should be reported in the output.

SettingsItem.Name: Threshold safety plot
SettingsItem.Description: Threshold for interpretation in the threshold value/exposure or exposure/threshold value plot, e.g. MOE(T) = HI, HQ, RPI = 1 or MOE(T) = 100 and HI, HQ, RPI = 0.01.

SettingsItem.Name: Inclusion percentage variability interval
SettingsItem.Description: The central percentage of the variability distribution to include in intervals for exposure, hazard and MOE (e.g. 90 means p5-p95).

SettingsItem.Name: Number of substances in hazard vs. exposure plot
SettingsItem.Description: Maximum number of substances to plot in hazard vs exposure plot.

SettingsItem.Name: Cumulation setting
SettingsItem.Description: Specify method for computing cumulative risks of multiple substances (e.g., via RPF weighted exposures or as a sum of ratios).
